Go to www.guildmagic.com. On the right upper corner of the page is a box that has slots for a user name and password. Beneath that box is a link that says “click here to create a user”. Fill in the field for user name, password, and e-mail. You can adjust your time zone and add a link to your personal webpage too.
A Step by Step Guide for Registering with Guild Magic
Step One - Create a User
On the main page in the upper right hand corner is a login spot. You will also get this prompt after you create a user. Just type in your name and password. If you are on a computer that only you use, the "Remember Me" box is very handy. If you check it, then everytime you visit the site, you are auto-logged in.
You will be taken to your user screen if you login from the main screen. If you use “Remember Me” and are taken to the main page which does not have the login box, you should look for a box in the menu along the left hand side which is labelled “My User”. Click on that to get to your user screen.
Step Two - Login
Your user screen will have a basic set up of user data at the top, characters in the middle, guilds at the bottom. User data is where you would change your password or e-mail info, the character section is where all your characters will be listed (duh!) and the guild section will show all the guilds you add to your user.
Step Three - Your User Screen
It’s easier to add the guild before you add the characters, this will make more sense once you see the character part. Click on the button that says “Add guilds to my user”. Then click on the server "Povar", and choose Exodus Fellowship. Click on the little button that says “add guild to my user”.
You will stay on the guild screen, but don’t panic! Simply scroll down to the bottom of the page and hit the button that says “back to my user”. There is one of these buttons at the bottom of every page.
Step Four- Add a Guild to your User
Ok, so you’re back at your user screen and ready to start adding your characters. This won’t take too long, unless you’re like certain people… woot! Alt brigade!! Ahem. Anyways, click on the button that says “Create new character”. You’ll be taken to a screen with lots and lots of drop boxes.
Simply fill in the name and select all the correct info for level/class/etc. There’s a drop box for guild, just choose Exodus Fellowship (this is why you add guilds first, otherwise they don’t show on the list and you have to retroactively add them through editing). If you would like to add your Caster’s Realm profile or the like, there’s a space to add that link. There’s even a spot for a picture or description. When you’ve entered everything to your satisfaction, simply hit “create character” at the bottom. You’ll bounce back to your user screen.

Repeat ad nauseam until all your characters you wish to join the Fellowship are entered.
Step Five - Add a Character to your User
On your user screen, each character is shown with some boxes prior to the name (to be addressed in a minute) and the level with a “Ding!” button after it. If you level, simply click on the ding button.
Step Six- DING!
